isis.stitle: HOOD, GRILLE AND FENDERS - 2000, 4000, 8000 - REMOVE AND INSTALL - 8000 SERIES MUD GUARDS

svcsubproc.title: 8100 Model Mud Guard - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. HEX BOLT AND FLAT WASHER (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: Remove the hex bolts, flat washers and hex lock nuts (Items 1 and 2) securing the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) to the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 5). Remove the mud guard and reinforcement, passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side mud guard and reinforcement.

svcsubproc.title: 8100 Model Mud Guard - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 54 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) on the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 5) and install the hex bolts with flat washers (Item 1) through the fender extension, mud guard and reinforcement. Then install hex lock nuts (Item 2), passenger side shown. Tighten to 125 to 140 in-lbs. (14 to 16 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install driver side mud guard and reinforcement.

svcsubproc.title: 8200 Model Mud Guard - Remove
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 55 for items in parentheses.

calloutgroup.callout1: 1. PAN HEAD SCREW AND FLAT WASHER (1/4-20 UNC)

step1.para: Remove the pan head screws and flat washers (Item 1) and hex lock nuts (Item 2) securing the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) to the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 5). Remove the mud guard and reinforcement, passenger side shown.
Repeat procedure to remove driver side mud guard and reinforcement.

svcsubproc.title: 8200 Model Mud Guard - Install
svcsubproc.para: Refer to Figure 55 for items in parentheses.

step1.para: Position the mud guard (Item 3) and reinforcement (Item 4) on the inside bottom edge of the fender extension (Item 5) and install the pan head screws with flat washers (Item 1) through the fender extension, mud guard and reinforcement. Then install hex lock nuts (Item 2), passenger side shown. Tighten to 125 to 140 in-lbs. (14 to 16 Nm).
Repeat procedure to install driver side mud guard and reinforcement.
